keyword: how many calories are in bratwurst
title: How Many Calories Are in Bratwurst?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in bratwurst with a full nutrition breakdown, including protein, fat, carbs, and tips for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Bratwurst?
assumptions: Cooked pork bratwurst sausage, average size (85g), grilled or boiled, no bun, condiments, or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type, size, cooking method, and seasonings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One average bratwurst provides about 290 kcal and 14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Served in a bun (add standard hot dog bun)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one bratwurst?
faqs.a: About 290 kcal for an average cooked pork bratwurst.
Yes, one bratwurst has around 14 g protein.

faqs.q: How much fat is in bratwurst?
faqs.a: Approximately 25 g total fat, including 9 g saturated fat per sausage.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in bratwurst?
faqs.a: Grilling or boiling keeps calories similar; frying adds 50-100 kcal from oil.
One bratwurst contains about 800 mg sodium, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.
